attributes.action: This petition calls on the UK government to have Russia expelled from the UN.
attributes.additional_details: I want a debate on the floor ASAP to manoeuvre Russia out of the UN.
attributes.background: The UK government and its allies should have Russia expelled from the United Nations. To avoid any vetoing by the 7 security members this should not include them and be open to the floor. Majority rules.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the United Nations and not for the UK Government to decide.
